did.unittitle: United States Information Agency radio broadcasts
did.abstract: Sound recordings prepared for broadcast on Voice of America, including a program entitled Have You Been Told?, 1961, relating to Soviet nuclear test resumption (transcript included); and interviews of W. Glenn Campbell, director of the Hoover Institution on War, Revolution and Peace, and of Dennis J. Doolin, Eugene Wu, and Yuan-li Wu, fellows of the Hoover Institution, 1965, relating to activities of the Hoover Institution in the area of Chinese studies. Digital copies also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

did.unittitle: Sound recording of Voice of America radio broadcast, Have You Been Told?,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: This VOA program, intended for the people of the Soviet Union, is about recent (1961) Soviet atomic bomb open-air testings and their implications. It features voices of dignitaries from around the world decrying the tests, some dramatized and/or translated and some authentic. Cliff Gross narrates. Includes transcript.
